synopsis.text: Osamu Tezuka and Kita Morio join forces with Toei Animation to bring you the thrilling tale of Sinbad and his young companion, Ali, who stowaway aboard the mighty transport ship, Boulder. After earning the respect of the ship's captain, the duo finds themselves on a daring journey to protect the stunning Princess Samir. Fleeing from an evil minister who seeks her hand in marriage, Samir boards the Boulder, leading Sinbad and Ali into a series of exhilarating escapades. From battling a peculiar bird guarding precious diamonds to confronting the ghosts of shipwrecked sailors, Sinbad's adventures are filled with twists, turns, and even spontaneous musical numbers. Prepare for a rollercoaster ride of emotions as Sinbad embarks on a quest to safeguard the princess and uncover hidden treasures in this captivating anime adaptation of the classic tale.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
